SELECT e.`object_id`, e.`permission_id` FROM `street` e JOIN `building_address` addr ON (addr.`parent_id` = e.`object_id` AND addr.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE') AND addr.`parent_entity_id` = 300) JOIN `building` b ON (b.`parent_id` = addr.`object_id` AND b.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')) JOIN `building_attribute` district_attr ON (b.`object_id` = district_attr.`object_id` AND district_attr.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND district_attr.`attribute_type_id` = 500 AND district_attr.`value_id` = #{parentId}) WHERE e.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE') UNION SELECT e.`object_id`, e.`permission_id` FROM `street` e JOIN `building_address` addr ON (addr.`parent_id` = e.`object_id` AND addr.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE') AND addr.`parent_entity_id` = 300) JOIN `building_attribute` district_attr ON (district_attr.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND district_attr.`attribute_type_id` = 500 AND district_attr.`value_id` = #{parentId}) JOIN `building_attribute` ref_attr ON (ref_attr.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND ref_attr.`attribute_type_id` = 501 AND ref_attr.`value_id` = addr.`object_id`) JOIN `building` b ON (b.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE') AND b.`object_id` = district_attr.`object_id` AND b.`object_id` = ref_attr.`object_id`) WHERE e.`status` IN ('ACTIVE', 'INACTIVE')
ORDER BY 1
